dataLink.name: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6

availability.description: An overview of the CMIP6 solar forcing dataset (irradiance as well as particle-related parameters) and guidelines for their usage.
availability.name: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6

description: Present day (2014) solar forcing. The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset. Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
name: Present Day 2014 Solar Irradiance Forcing
keywords: Solar Forcing, 2014, present day, PD, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
